document_title: Wrist bursitis: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_content:
When diagnosing the disease, doctors often prescribe patients: (3)
Clinical examination: Based on symptoms including heat, redness and swelling at the wrist joint; Joint fluid analysis: The doctor takes the amount of fluid around the inflamed joint and sends it for testing.; X-ray, MRI or ultrasound: The doctor may prescribe these methods for differential diagnosis of other bone and joint diseases.
